user_story.i_want: propose the ejection of a member
user_story.so_that: remove a member who shouldn't be involved anymore

whens_list: I go to the member page for "bob@example.com"
I press "Create proposal to eject this member"
thens_list: I should see a proposal to eject "bob@example.com"
everyone should receive an email notifying them of the proposal
